name: Death or Glory

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6.

sections.body: Against a creature of size Large or larger, you can make a single melee attack as a full-round action, gaining a +4 bonus on the attack roll, damage roll, and critical confirmation roll. You gain an additional +1 on this bonus at base attack bonus +11, +16, and +20 (for a maximum of +7 at base attack +20). After you resolve your attack, the opponent you attack can spend an immediate action to make a single melee attack against you with the same bonuses.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: You can combine the full-round action attack this feat allows with the benefit of Vital Strike, Improved Vital Strike, or Greater Vital Strike.
sections.name: Special

description: Even when facing a larger foe, you aren't afraid to take great risks in order to finish the fight.
